        public java.lang.String addProducer(java.lang.String nickName,
                                    java.lang.String id,
                                    java.lang.String imageUrl,
                                    java.lang.String name,
                                    int option)
        addProducer= This method Add a producer to the program
        Parameters:
        nickName: - String = The nickName of the producer to add
        id: - String = The id of the producer to add
        imageUrl: - String = The url of the image of the producer
        name: - String = The name of the Producer to add
        option: - int = The type of producer to add 1=Artist or 2=CreatorContent
        Returns:
        msj: String = A message that confirms if the producer was added successfully

      • addAudio

        public java.lang.String addAudio(java.lang.String producerNickName,
                                 java.lang.String name,
                                 java.lang.String url,
                                 int hours,
                                 int minutes,
                                 int seconds,
                                 java.lang.String album,
                                 int genre,
                                 double price,
                                 java.lang.String description,
                                 int category,
                                 int option)
        addAudio= This method adds a Audio to NeoTunes
        Parameters:
        producerId: - String = The id of the audio producer
        name: - String = The name of the audio
        url: - String = The url of the image of the
        hours: - int = int = The hours of duration of the audio
        minutes: - int = The minutes of duration of the audio
        seconds: - int = The seconds of duration of the audio
        album: - String = The album of the song
        genre: - int = The genre of the song
        price: - doble = The price of the song
        description: - String = The description of the podcast
        category: - int = The category of the podcast
        option: - int = The type of audio to add 1=Song or 2=Podcast
        Returns:
        msj: String = A message that confirms if the Audio was Added successfully

      • editPlaylist

        public java.lang.String editPlaylist(java.lang.String idConsumer,
                                     int playlistPos,
                                     java.lang.String nameAudio,
                                     java.lang.String producerNickName,
                                     java.lang.String newPlayListName,
                                     int option)
        editPlaylist= This method allows to edit a playlist (Add audio, delete audio or change the name)
        Parameters:
        idConsumer: - String = The id of the Consumer
        playListCode: - String = The code of the Playlist
        nameAudio: - String = The name of the audio to add or delete
        producerNickName: - String = The nickName of the producer of the audio to add or delete
        newPlayListName: - String = The new Name of the playlis to change
        option: - int = The option that the user selects 1=Add Audio, 2=Delete Audio or 3=Change Name of playlist
        Returns:
        msj: String = A message that confirms if the playlist was edited successfully
